1.0.0.name: memoizeasync
1.0.0.description: Helper for memoizing async functions and methods

scripts.travis: npm test && npm run lint && npm run coverage && (<coverage/lcov.info coveralls || true)
scripts.coverage: NODE_ENV=development nyc --reporter lcov --reporter text -- mocha && echo google-chrome coverage/lcov-report/index.html
